name: Mathmech Division
desc: You can Tribute 1 Cyberse monster you control in the Extra Monster Zone; Special Summon up to 1 Level 4 Cyberse monster each from your hand and GY. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; its ATK becomes halved until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Mathmech Division" once per turn.
